creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: black lacquered, high walled tray with crescent-shaped cutouts on sides near top; simple, silver wavelike pattern painted on each side; celadon glazed cup with vertical incised lines and incised square motif around lip; small bamboo cylinder
medium: Lacquer on wood, glazed ceramic, and bamboo
title: (Tobacco tray with waves)
